subject: Objet : Pédalier Plus X non reconnu — besoin urgent outil firmware (.sfu)
description_text:
Bonjour,
J’ai un pédalier Simsonn Plus X. Il est détecté par Windows comme USB Composite / HID, mais aucune entrée ne remonte dans Pedal Config 3.5 ou en jeu — je pense qu’il est en mode bootloader / firmware corrompu.
J’ai déjà le fichier firmware .sfu, mais le Manager ne propose aucun bouton de mise à jour.
Puis-je avoir votre outil officiel de flash / recovery (SimsonnFirmwareUpgrade.exe ou équivalent) afin de reflasher manuellement le firmware ?
Merci d’avance pour votre aide rapide.
Cordialement,
Bryan​ <https://1drv.ms/i/c/9eccee21163f70d0/EaOpagGOWlZAtc81GnklFgIBLtWVe7TjfypXAKbrgi7nkA>

conversations.body_text: Hi Bryan Dupressoir,    You can try performing a manual firmware recovery using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 by following the steps below:  1. Enter Firmware Update Mode    Press and hold the Update button on the PlusX control box.    While holding the button, reconnect the USB cable.    The software will indicate that the device has entered Firmware Update Mode.    2. Manually Restore the Firmware    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update    Select the firmware file path: pedals-firmware-pedals-plusx.sfu    Wait for the update to complete, then reconnect the device and test again.

[IMG_1037.jpeg]Bonjour,

Où est le bouton de d’update svp ?

Cordialement,
B.DUPRESSOIR

Le 27 oct. 2025 à 11:55, service@simsonn.com a écrit :

﻿
Hi Bryan Dupressoir,

You can try performing a manual firmware recovery using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 by following the steps below:
1. Enter Firmware Update Mode

  *
Press and hold the Update button on the PlusX control box.
  *
While holding the button, reconnect the USB cable.
  *
The software will indicate that the device has entered Firmware Update Mode.

2. Manually Restore the Firmware

  *
In the software, go to:
Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update
  *
Select the firmware file path:
pedals-firmware-pedals-plusx.sfu
  *
Wait for the update to complete, then reconnect the device and test again.



Activé Lun, 27 Oct. à 6:36 H , Bryan Dupressoir <bryandupressoir@live.fr> a écrit:

Hi Bryan Dupressoir,  Version 1.7.0 does not support the update feature. If you need additional features, you can purchase a PlusX control box separately, which supports weight (kg) display and a vibration feedback interface.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498

Hi Bryan Dupressoir,     You can use Freejoy 1.7.0 to calibrate the pedals, as version 1.7.1 is not compatible. Please make sure to click ‘Read config from device’ each time before operating the device in Freejoy.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link
